articles.title: US FDA issues 3 observations under Form 483 for IPCA’s Piparia Unit - CNBCTV18
articles.description: USFDA issued three observations under Form 483 for IPCA Laboratories' formulations manufacturing unit situated at Piparia, Silvassa. The observations were followed by the USFDA inspection at the site from April 18 to April 26, 2023.
